captions.text:
I'll tell you
a story of someone I know

He broke up with his love
a few days ago
I mean someone I know
He seems to have a hard time
What do you think
Oh, it's not my story

Just a story of
someone I know
He seems to love her too much

It's been more than 1 year
Still he can't take his eyes off her

He used to say his single
in front of girls

But he showed off his girl friend
to his friends
Maybe she looked pretty

Like his mom said
everyday when he was young

That everything's worthful in you
from head to toe
He probably liked her that much

Every night
he took her home by taxi

And he came home
by the last bus

Coming back home..
exhausted

But he wanted to be with her
one more minute
Taking each other's hand..
Melting the worries..
So they were happy

What a great story so far
Full of happiness

By the way,
who's that guy?
Uh.. Just someone I know

I'll tell you
a story of someone I know

He broke up with his love
a few days ago
I mean someone I know
He seems to have a hard time
What do you think
Oh, it's not my story

Just a story of
someone I know
Something got strange
At one point..
The awkwardness between them

Why the hell is it
He couldn't find out

Later he found that
she's leaving.. far away

She said let's stop it
while crying

He clung to her white finger
like a crayfish

When he saw her get pinched
and hurt, he had to lose his hold
I told him that he had to admit
The fact that she doesn't love him

No, that's not true
He kept denying
He begged like a starving beggar

But she pitied him
not loved him
I'm so sad
Did I just say I'm..?

I'm getting too emotional
You understand?

By the way, how could
I know all the details?
Well.. I'm close to him

I'll tell you
a story of someone I know

He broke up with his love
a few days ago
I mean someone I know
He seems to have a hard time
What  do you think
Oh, it's not my story

Just a story of
someone I know
Things like this might happen..

Just a story of
someone I know

That's so pathetic
Isn't it childish

Just a story of
someone I know
But what do you think

What do you think
should he do?

Should he grab her hand
Should he give up her
Am I being too serious

I'll tell you
a story of someone you know

He broke up with his love
a few days ago

That's right
It's me

I'm having a hard time
I'm so sad
What should I do
No.. no..
I'm just saying..

comments.text:
내가 아는 사람 얘기해 줄게
며칠 전 사랑하는 그녀와 헤어진
주위 그냥 아는 사람
힘들고 많이 슬퍼하던데
너는 어떻게 생각해
아 내 얘기는 절대 아니야
그냥 그냥 아는 사람 얘기

그는 그녀를 너무 사랑했대
1년을 넘게 만났어도 반하겠대
여자들 앞에서 싱글이라 하던 그가
친구들에게도 자랑했대

예뻐 보였나 봐 그의 엄마가
어릴적 날마다 해준 말마따나
머리부터 발끝까지 넌 버릴 구석이 없다고
그 정도로 좋았었나 봐

매일 밤 택시 타고 그녈 데려다 주고
그는 막차 타고 집에 돌아와 
수고스럽지만 1분 더 있고 싶어서
손잡고 있음 걱정 녹아내려서

그렇게 둘은 행복했대
여기까진 스토리 좋잖아 행복 백 배 
근데 그 사람이 누구냐고?
어… 그냥 아는 사람

내가 아는 사람 얘기해 줄게
며칠 전 사랑하는 그녀와 헤어진
주위 그냥 아는 사람
힘들고 많이 슬퍼하던데
너는 어떻게 생각해
아 내 얘기는 절대 아니야
그냥 그냥 아는 사람 얘기

뭔가 이상했대 어느 순간부터
가까웠던 둘 사이에 어색함이 줄곧
왜 그런지 대체 모르겠더라고
후에 알고 보니 되게 멀리 떠난다고

그녀 울면서 이제 그만하쟤
하얀 손끝에 가재처럼 매달려 봤지만
더욱 아파하는 모습에 집게를 놨네
나는 말해 줬어 인정해 그년 널 사랑하지 않아

아냐 몇번이고 부정했어 애써
배고픈 거지처럼 구걸했지만
그녀가 준 건 사랑 아닌 동정
나 너무 슬퍼

나 방금 나라고 했니
너무 감정이입 했나 봐 이해 되지?
근데 어떻게 이렇게 자세히도 아냐고?
어... 친하거든

내가 아는 사람 얘기해 줄게
며칠 전 사랑하는 그녀와 헤어진
주위 그냥 아는 사람
힘들고 많이 슬퍼하던데
너는 어떻게 생각해
아 내 얘기는 진짜 아니야
그냥 그냥 아는 사람 얘기


누군 이런일도 있다 해서
(그냥 그냥 아는 사람 얘기)
참 별일이야 유치하지 않냐?
(그냥 그냥 아는 사람 얘기)

넌 근데 어떻게 생각해 
그 남자가 어떻게 해야 될 것 같애?
잡아야 할까 포기해야 할까
나 너무 진지한가?

니가 아는 사람 얘기해 줄게
며칠 전 사랑하는 그녀와 헤어진
그래 지금 나란 사람
힘들고 많이 슬퍼 그러는데
이걸 어떻게 해야 해
아니다 아냐
그냥 그냥﻿

이게 맞는지 아닌지는 모르겠는데요 일단 뮤비에서 산이가 여자친구에게 팔찌를 선물해 주는데 의사도 그 팔찌를 차고있는걸로 봐서(시계도) 
의사가 산이여친에게 대시(?) 한것 같아요 그래서 산이여친이 이별통보를 한것 같구요 그리고 의사가 그팔찌를 산이가 선물했다는걸 알고 
산이가 희망을 가지고 있을까봐 산이한테 '그년널 사랑하지않아' 라고 단정짓게 해서 산이랑 산이여친을 헤어지게 만든거 같구요 산이여친은 
양성애자 같아요 아니라기엔 너무 이상해요 그리고 마지막에는 산이가 그네에서 사라지는데 그건 산이가 자살한거 같구요
정리하자면

comments.text:
I know im late xD

This is either something that happened to San E or to someone he knows 
(just like the lyrics said) so basically-- he had a crush on the girl in 
the store and they started dating but soon the girl started to notice she 
didn't like boys-- reason why all of a sudden she refused to share kisses 
with him. Then thats when San E starts to go to the psychiatrist and has 
all those flashbacks as he tells her. He realizes she has the same bracelet 
his ex-gf had and starts to wonder why they both have it. The psychiatrist 
realizes that San E is talking about the person whom she's dating and thats 
why she gets all uncomfortable and stuff lol﻿
